ingredients: 2 medium Poblano or Anaheim chiles, roasted, peeled and seeded
6 tablespoons grated Cotija cheese (substitute Parmesan if you can't find this cheese)
2 large heads romaine lettuce, rinsed and spun dry
⅓ cup finely grated Cotija cheese
1 roasted red bell pepper, peeled and cut into julienne strips
1 cup cooked chicken or steak, chopped (optional)
